title: FAANG stocks have outsize effect on broader market, says Exponential ETFs' Josh Blechman.
text:
FAANG stocks have outsize effect on broader market, says Exponential ETFs' Josh Blechman. 9:59pm GMT - 05:37 
Over 15 percent of the S&P 500 weight is in FAANG and Microsoft stocks, giving them an outsize effect on the U.S. market, says Josh Blechman, director of capital markets at Exponential ETFs.   
Over 15 percent of the S&P 500 weight is in FAANG and Microsoft stocks, giving them an outsize effect on the U.S. market, says Josh Blechman, director of capital markets at Exponential ETFs.  //reut.rs/2poK2Cg
